trans-unit.source: Represents the run-time behavior of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer" />.
trans-unit.target: Representa o comportamento de tempo de execução de <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.DataContractSerializerOperationBehavior> enables the control of <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer> options, such as the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer.MaxItemsInObjectGraph%2A> and <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer.IgnoreExtensionDataObject%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.DataContractSerializerOperationBehavior> permite que o controle de <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer> opções, como o <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer.MaxItemsInObjectGraph%2A> e <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer.IgnoreExtensionDataObject%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: Some of these properties can be set only using the constructor of the class.
trans-unit.target: Algumas dessas propriedades podem ser definidas apenas usando o construtor da classe.

trans-unit.source: In that case, the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer> can be replaced using the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.DataContractSerializerOperationBehavior.CreateSerializer%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Nesse caso, o <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer> pode ser substituído usando o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.DataContractSerializerOperationBehavior.CreateSerializer%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] data contracts, see [Using Data Contracts](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/using-data-contracts.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] contratos de dados, consulte [usando contratos de dados](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/using-data-contracts.md).

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] using the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.DataContractSerializerOperationBehavior> to replace the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.IDataContractSurrogate> returned by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.DataContractSerializerOperationBehavior.DataContractSurrogate%2A> property, see [Data Contract Surrogates](~/docs/framework/wcf/extending/data-contract-surrogates.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] usando o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.DataContractSerializerOperationBehavior> para substituir o <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.IDataContractSurrogate> retornado pelo <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.DataContractSerializerOperationBehavior.DataContractSurrogate%2A> propriedade, consulte [substitutos de contrato de dados](~/docs/framework/wcf/extending/data-contract-surrogates.md).

trans-unit.source: The following example finds the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.DataContractSerializerOperationBehavior> in the collection of behaviors for an operation and resets the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer.MaxItemsInObjectGraph%2A> and <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer.IgnoreExtensionDataObject%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir localiza o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.DataContractSerializerOperationBehavior> na coleção de comportamentos para uma operação e redefine o <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer.MaxItemsInObjectGraph%2A> e <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer.IgnoreExtensionDataObject%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.DataContractSerializerOperationBehavior" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.DataContractSerializerOperationBehavior" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription" /> that represents the operation.
trans-unit.target: Uma <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription" /> que representa a operação.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.DataContractSerializerOperationBehavior" /> class with the specified operation description.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.DataContractSerializerOperationBehavior" /> com a descrição de operação especificada.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription" /> that represents the operation.
trans-unit.target: Uma <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription" /> que representa a operação.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.DataContractFormatAttribute" /> that is used to control the serialization process.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.DataContractFormatAttribute" /> que é usado para controlar o processo de serialização.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.DataContractSerializerOperationBehavior" /> class with the specified operation description and data contract format.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.DataContractSerializerOperationBehavior" /> com a descrição de operação e o formato de contrato de dados especificados.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of a class that inherits from <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.XmlObjectSerializer" /> for serialization and deserialization processes.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma instância de uma classe que herda de <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.XmlObjectSerializer" /> para processos de serialização e desserialização.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> to create the serializer for.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Type" /> para o qual criar o serializador.

trans-unit.source: The name of the generated type.
trans-unit.target: O nome do tipo gerado.

trans-unit.source: The namespace of the generated type.
trans-unit.target: O namespace do tipo gerado.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IList`1" /> of <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that contains known types.
trans-unit.target: Uma <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IList`1" /> de <see cref="T:System.Type" /> que contém os tipos conhecidos.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of a class that inherits from <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.XmlObjectSerializer" /> for serialization and deserialization processes.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma instância de uma classe que herda de <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.XmlObjectSerializer" /> para processos de serialização e desserialização.

trans-unit.source: An instance of a class that inherits from the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.XmlObjectSerializer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de uma classe que herda da classe <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.XmlObjectSerializer" />.

trans-unit.source: Both the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.NetDataContractSerializer> and the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer> inherit from the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XmlObjectSerializer> class.
trans-unit.target: Tanto o <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.NetDataContractSerializer> e <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer> herdam o <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XmlObjectSerializer> classe.

trans-unit.source: The type to serialize or deserialize.
trans-unit.target: O tipo a ser serializado ou desserializado.

trans-unit.source: The name of the serialized type.
trans-unit.target: O nome do tipo serializado.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryString" /> that contains the namespace of the serialized type.
trans-unit.target: Uma <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryString" /> que contém o namespace do tipo serializado.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IList`1" /> of <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that contains known types.
trans-unit.target: Uma <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IList`1" /> de <see cref="T:System.Type" /> que contém os tipos conhecidos.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of a class that inherits from <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.XmlObjectSerializer" /> for serialization and deserialization processes with an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryString" /> that contains the namespace.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma instância de uma classe que herda de <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.XmlObjectSerializer" /> para processos de serialização e desserialização com uma <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryString" /> que contém o namespace.

trans-unit.source: An instance of a class that inherits from the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.XmlObjectSerializer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de uma classe que herda da classe <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.XmlObjectSerializer" />.

trans-unit.source: Both the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer> and the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.NetDataContractSerializer> inherit from the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XmlObjectSerializer> class.
trans-unit.target: Tanto o <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer> e <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.NetDataContractSerializer> herdam o <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XmlObjectSerializer> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.DataContractFormatAttribute" /> associated with the operation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.DataContractFormatAttribute" /> associado à operação.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.DataContractFormatAttribute" /> associated with the operation.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.DataContractFormatAttribute" /> associado à operação.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an implementation of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractResolver" /> that is used to dynamically map types during serialization and deserialization processes.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define uma implementação do <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractResolver" /> que é usada para mapear tipos dinamicamente durante processos de serialização e desserialização.

trans-unit.source: Type: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractResolver" />
trans-unit.target: Tipo: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractResolver" />

trans-unit.source: A class that maps an <see langword="xsi:type" /> to a known data contract type.
trans-unit.target: Uma classe que mapeia um <see langword="xsi:type" /> para um tipo de contrato de dados conhecidos.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractResolver> class document.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte o <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractResolver> documento de classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a surrogate to be used during the serialization and deserialization processes.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um substituto a ser usado durante os processos de serialização e desserialização.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.IDataContractSurrogate" /> that is used as a substitute serializer.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.IDataContractSurrogate" /> que é usado como um serializador substituta.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the data provided by an extension of a type (and therefore not in the data contract) is ignored or not.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que especifica se os dados fornecidos por uma extensão de um tipo (e, portanto, não no contrato de dados) são ignorados ou não.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to ignore the data; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para ignorar os dados. Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: When set to `true`, the extra data is returned with any other serialized data.
trans-unit.target: Quando definido como `true`, os dados extras são retornados com quaisquer outros dados serializados.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.IExtensibleDataObject> interface.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] o <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.IExtensibleDataObject> interface.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of items in the object graph to serialize or deserialize.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o número máximo de itens no grafo de objeto a serem serializados ou desserializados.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of items in the object graph to serialize or deserialize.
trans-unit.target: O número máximo de itens no gráfico de objeto para serializar ou desserializar.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription" /> to add the parameters to.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription" /> à qual adicionar os parâmetros.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingParameterCollection" /> that contains the parameters to add.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingParameterCollection" /> que contém os parâmetros a serem adicionados.

trans-unit.source: Adds a collection of parameters to the behavior.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona uma coleção de parâmetros ao comportamento.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription" /> that represents the operation.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription" /> que representa a operação.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientOperation" /> that represents a client.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientOperation" /> que representa um cliente.

trans-unit.source: Attaches a client behavior to the operation.
trans-unit.target: Anexa um comportamento do cliente à operação.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription" /> that represents the operation.
trans-unit.target: Uma <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription" /> que representa a operação.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.DispatchOperation" /> to attach the behavior to.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.DispatchOperation" /> à qual anexar o comportamento.

trans-unit.source: Applies the behavior to the operation.
trans-unit.target: Aplica o comportamento à operação.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription" /> that represents the operation to validate.
trans-unit.target: Uma <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription" /> que representa a operação a ser validada.

trans-unit.source: Validates the operation.
trans-unit.target: Valida a operação.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter" /> to use for the export.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter" /> a ser usado para a exportação.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext" /> for the WSDL.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext" /> para o WSDL.

trans-unit.source: Exports the WSDL representation of the operation.
trans-unit.target: Exporta a representação de WSDL da operação.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter" /> to use for the export.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter" /> a ser usado para a exportação.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext" /> for the WSDL.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext" /> para o WSDL.

trans-unit.source: Exports the endpoint description as a WSDL document.
trans-unit.target: Exporta a descrição do ponto de extremidade como um documento WSDL.
